long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A light-weight Japanese Kanji look-up dictionary, built specifically for Japanese kanji learners.

1) Simply highlight a kanji on the chrome browser.
2) Look up the selected kanji with "Search" button on the extension pop-up.
